column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I had a job interview coming up in a couple days .
#text=After filling out so many applications I noticed that my hair was getting very long .
#text=So I ended up deciding to get my hair cut in order to look good for the upcoming interview .
#text=I got in the care in the early afternoon and drove off to my usual barber .
#text=I have been going to this barber for the last 5 years , and never had a problem .
#text=Once I arrived for the appointment , I sat down on the chair and told her I wanted the usual .
#text=She asked what the occasion was and I told her that I had a job interview in a couple days .
#text=She wished me the best of luck while she continued cutting my hair .
#text=I ended up paying her a good tip considering I felt bad that I did n't get a good hair cut in a long time .
